title: The Writer's Almanac - Friday, November 5, 2021
description: “I do not remember when I did not expect to be a writer,” wrote Ella Wheeler Wilcox, American poet, born on this day in 1850.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: “I do not remember when I did not expect to be a writer,” wrote Ella Wheeler Wilcox, American poet, born on this day in 1850.
